attributes.action: Stop Michael Gove taking away Triple Science Modular Exams
attributes.additional_details:
We think it is best to have exams during the course.
Mr. Gove wants us to take all exams at the end of year 11.
If we fail we will only have one more chance to pass, unlike modular testing when you have as multiple chances which is a better demonstration of knowledge and not just last minute revision.
